faq.title: ƒåesto postavljana pitanja
faq.subtitle: Sve va≈æno o dozvolama za poslovne objekte, registraciji i osnivanju preduzeƒáa u Beƒçu

q1.question: ≈†ta je poslovni objekat i da li mi treba dozvola?
q1.answer: Poslovni objekat (Betriebsanlage) je svaka instalacija koja se koristi za obavljanje zanatske delatnosti. To ukljuƒçuje poslovne prostorije, radionice, skladi≈°ta, ugostiteljske objekte i mnogo vi≈°e. Da li vam je potrebna dozvola zavisi od razliƒçitih faktora: vrsta poslovanja, veliƒçina, lokacija, radno vreme i potencijalni problemi (buka, miris). Uredba o izuzeƒáu (Genehmigungsfreistellungsverordnung) odreƒëuje koji preduzeƒáa mogu da rade bez dozvole. Koristite na≈°u besplatnu proveru da saznate da li vam je potrebna dozvola.

q2.question: Koliko traje dobijanje dozvole za poslovni objekat u Beƒçu?
q2.answer: Trajanje varira u zavisnosti od slo≈æenosti va≈°eg poslovanja. Jednostavni sluƒçajevi bez uƒçe≈°ƒáa kom≈°ija: 4-8 nedelja. Slo≈æeni objekti sa obavestenjem kom≈°ija: 3-6 meseci. MA 36 (Beƒçka zanatska uprava) je nadle≈æna institucija. Savet: Kompletan zahtev sa svim dokumentima znaƒçajno ubrzava proces.

q3.question: Koliko ko≈°ta dozvola za poslovni objekat?
q3.answer: Naknade zavise od administrativnog napora. Pojednostavljeni postupak: oko 100-300 evra. Normalan postupak sa ve≈°taƒçenjima: 500-2000 evra. Veliki ili slo≈æeni objekti: 2000-5000 evra i vi≈°e. Mogu se dodati dodatni tro≈°kovi za ve≈°take, planove i tehniƒçke dokaze. Taƒçne tarife mo≈æete naƒái na wien.gv.at.

q4.question: Mogu li da otvorim posao pre dobijanja dozvole?
q4.answer: Ne, ako va≈°e preduzeƒáe zahteva dozvolu, NE SMETE da poƒçnete pre nego ≈°to dobijete odobrenje. To bi bila administrativna prekr≈°aj sa kaznama do 50.000 evra. Za preduzeƒáa izuzeta od dozvole (prema uredbi o izuzeƒáu) mo≈æete odmah da poƒçnete nakon registracije zanata. Na≈°a provera vam poma≈æe da utvrdite da li vam je potrebna dozvola.

q5.question: Koji dokumenti su mi potrebni za dozvolu za poslovni objekat?
q5.answer: Standardni dokumenti: Zanatska dozvola ili koncesija, osnova i situacioni plan, opis objekta, dokaz o pravu kori≈°ƒáenja (ugovor o zakupu/vlasni≈°tvo), tehniƒçki opisi (npr. ventilacija, buka). U zavisnosti od poslovanja, dodatno: procena buke, koncept za≈°tite od po≈æara, dokaz statike, procena uticaja na ≈æivotnu sredinu. MA 36 savetuje koje dokumente konkretno treba.

q6.question: Koja je razlika izmeƒëu registracije zanata i dozvole za poslovni objekat?
q6.answer: Registracija zanata: Ovla≈°ƒáuje vas da obavljate zanat (kod zanatske uprave). Dozvola za poslovni objekat: Dozvoljava rad na odreƒëenoj lokaciji (uzima u obzir buku, sigurnost, kom≈°ije). Potrebno je OBE: Prvo zanatska dozvola, zatim dozvola za poslovni objekat za lokaciju. Neka preduzeƒáa su izuzeta od zahteva za dozvolu (pogledajte uredbu o izuzeƒáu).

q7.question: Da li se uredba o izuzeƒáu odnosi na mene?
q7.answer: Beƒçka uredba o izuzeƒáu oslobaƒëa odreƒëena preduzeƒáa od zahteva za dozvolu ako ispunjavaju odreƒëene kriterijume. Primeri: maloprodaja do 600 m¬≤, kancelarije (gotovo uvek), male radionice, kozmetiƒçki saloni, sme≈°taj do 30 kreveta bez bazena. ALI: Izuzeci va≈æe za buku, muziku, opasne supstance, mehaniƒçku ventilaciju izvan omotaƒça zgrade. Koristite na≈°u proveru za brzu procenu.

q8.question: Da li mi kao ugostitelju treba dozvola za poslovni objekat u Beƒçu?
q8.answer: Da, u veƒáini sluƒçajeva. Ugostiteljska preduzeƒáa (restorani, kafiƒái, barovi) obiƒçno zahtevaju dozvole zbog: emisija mirisa (kuhinja), buka (gosti, muzika), separatori masti, ventilacioni sistemi. Izuzeci: Male prodavnice sladoleda bez sedi≈°ta mogu biti izuzete. Proces mo≈æe trajati 3-6 meseci - planirajte to u svoj raspored otvaranja!

q9.question: Ne govorim nemaƒçki - mogu li ipak da pokrenem posao?
q9.answer: Da! Na≈°a veb stranica podr≈æava 8 jezika: nemaƒçki, engleski, srpski, hrvatski, turski, italijanski, ≈°panski i ukrajinski. Za zvaniƒçne postupke: MA 36 i Privredna komora nude vi≈°ejeziƒçno savetovanje. Za registraciju zanata trebate: paso≈°/liƒçnu kartu, broj socijalnog osiguranja, eventualno prevodilac za dokumente. Mnoge startup usluge u Beƒçu su vi≈°ejeziƒçne.

q10.question: ≈†ta se de≈°ava ako moji kom≈°ije prigovaraju mom poslovnom objektu?
q10.answer: Za objekte koji zahtevaju dozvolu, kom≈°ije se obave≈°tavaju tokom procesa (uƒçe≈°ƒáe kom≈°ija). Oni mogu da podnesu prigovore u vezi: preterane buke, neugodnog mirisa, sigurnosnih problema, saobraƒáajnih problema. Uprava preispituje prigovore i mo≈æe da nametne uslove (npr. za≈°tita od buke, ograniƒçenja radnog vremena). Dobro planiranje i rana komunikacija sa kom≈°ijama mogu spreƒçiti mnoge konflikte.

gfvoChecker.title: Assess permit exemption under the 2nd GFVO
gfvoChecker.intro: Answer three questions to receive a legally grounded assessment of whether your facility is permit-free.
gfvoChecker.disclaimer:
Note: This tool provides orientation.
It checks whether your business generally falls under an exemption of Vienna‚Äôs 2nd Permit Exemption Ordinance.
The result is not an administrative decision or legal advice under the Legal Services Act.
The binding decision is made by MA 36 (Vienna business facilities authority).

category.title: Which category applies to the facility?
category.description: Select the category from ¬ß 1 (1) nos. 1‚Äì13 of the 2nd GFVO that best matches your planned operation.
category.hint: Tip: If none apply, choose ‚ÄúNone of the categories‚Äù to receive an immediate permit-required result.

operatingTimes.title: Do you comply with the operating time limits?
operatingTimes.description: Permit-free facilities must run Monday‚ÄìFriday 06:00‚Äì22:00 and Saturday 06:00‚Äì19:00 (deliveries until 19:00/18:00).

compliant.title: Yes, we stay within these windows
compliant.description: Operation is limited to the hours specified in ¬ß 1 (2) of the 2nd GFVO.

notCompliant.title: No, longer opening/delivery times planned
notCompliant.description: Night-time, Sunday business or deliveries outside the permitted windows are foreseen.

operatingTimes.reminder: Exceptions apply only to accommodation, ice-cream parlours, textile pick-up stations, data centres as well as facilities in stations, airports, ports or approved complexes (¬ß 1 (2) 2nd GFVO).

exclusions.title: Do any ¬ß 2 2nd GFVO exclusions apply?
exclusions.description: Check every statement that fits. A single exclusion triggers the permit requirement.
exclusions.reminder: Only if none of the ¬ß 2 2nd GFVO exclusions are triggered will the facility remain permit-free.

retail.title: Retail up to 600 m¬≤
retail.description: e.g. shop, boutique or store with max. 600 m¬≤ sales area.

office.title: Office operation
office.description: Pure office/service rooms without noise-intensive machinery.

warehouse.title: Indoor warehouse up to 600 m¬≤
warehouse.description: Closed storage for goods or supplies up to 600 m¬≤.

beauty.title: Cosmetics & personal care
beauty.description: Cosmetic, foot care, hairdresser, massage and bandagist businesses.

tailor.title: Tailoring & shoe service
tailor.description: Alteration tailors, household-type sewing shops or cobblers.

dental.title: Dental studio/lab
dental.description: Without smelting furnace or only with a furnace connected to a chimney.

accommodation.title: Accommodation (max. 30 beds)
accommodation.description: Hotels/guesthouses without wellness area, offering at most breakfast or light snacks.

iceCreamParlor.title: Ice-cream parlour
iceCreamParlor.description: Catering business operated purely as an ice-cream parlour.

textilePickup.title: Textile pick-up station
textilePickup.description: Drop-off points for dry-cleaning/ironing without on-site processing.

dataCenter.title: Data centre
dataCenter.description: Electronic data processing without own firing systems (emergency power allowed).

insideInfrastructure.title: Facility inside station, airport, port or hospital
insideInfrastructure.description: Facility located within an already approved transport hub or hospital.

withinComplex.title: Small facility up to 400 m¬≤ in an approved complex
withinComplex.description: e.g. shop inside a shopping mall with an existing overall permit.

none.title: None of the categories apply
none.description: The planned facility cannot be assigned to the types listed in ¬ß 1 (1) of the 2nd GFVO.

externalVentilation.question: Are there outdoor ventilation or AC units?
externalVentilation.description: External fans, AC units or exhaust/waste-heat devices fall under ¬ß 2 (1) of the 2nd GFVO.

regulatedStorage.question: Do you store hazardous substances with special legal storage rules?
regulatedStorage.description: E.g. larger amounts of flammable liquids, gas cylinders or LPG requiring specific storage (¬ß 2 (2) 2nd GFVO).

unregulatedHazards.question: Do you store labelled hazardous substances without special rules?
unregulatedHazards.description: Even without specific regulations, storing labelled hazardous chemicals triggers ¬ß 2 (3) 2nd GFVO.

loudMusic.question: Is loud music or live performance planned?
loudMusic.description: Anything beyond low-level background music (‚âà 58 dB(A)) counts as music activity under ¬ß 2 (4) 2nd GFVO.

ippcSeveso.question: Does the project fall under IPPC or Seveso?
ippcSeveso.description: Large-scale plants subject to EIA/major-accident rules (¬ß 2 (5) 2nd GFVO) remain permit-bound.

permitFree.title: Permit-free under the 2nd GFVO
permitFree.subtitle: All requirements of the 2nd GFVO are met ‚Äì no facility permit is currently required.
permitFree.note: Continue to comply with the stated assumptions (category, operating times, no exclusions). Any change requires a new assessment or the exemption no longer applies.

permitRequired.title: Permit requirement applies
permitRequired.subtitle: At least one condition of the 2nd GFVO is not fulfilled. A facility permit under ¬ß 74 GewO is therefore required.
permitRequired.nextStepsIntro: Submit an application to MA 36 ‚Äì Betriebsanlagen (responsible regional centre) before construction or start-up.
permitRequired.documentsTitle: Typical documents requested by the City of Vienna
documents: List of machines and equipment with performance/emission data
Site plan, floor plans and sections of the premises (multiple copies)
Technical descriptions of special installations (e.g. ventilation, heating, cooling)
Evidence for related legal areas (e.g. building, water, labour or fire safety law)
permitRequired.contactHint: Recommendation: Contact the responsible centre in advance (project consultation day) or file a declaratory application if unclear.

reasons.categoryMet: The facility belongs to {category} and is covered by the permit-free categories in ¬ß 1 (1) of the 2nd GFVO.
reasons.operatingTimesMet: Planned operating and delivery times follow the limits of ¬ß 1 (2) 2nd GFVO.
reasons.operatingTimesExempt: {category} is exempt from the operating time limits according to ¬ß 1 (2) 2nd GFVO.
reasons.noExclusions: None of the exclusion criteria in ¬ß 2 2nd GFVO are triggered.
reasons.categoryMissing: The facility cannot be assigned to any category in ¬ß 1 (1) 2nd GFVO ‚Äì a permit is required.
reasons.operatingTimesMissing: Planned operating or delivery hours exceed the permitted windows (¬ß 1 (2) 2nd GFVO) ‚Äì exemption no longer applies.
reasons.externalVentilation: Outdoor ventilation or AC units trigger ¬ß 2 (1) 2nd GFVO, making the facility permit-bound.
reasons.regulatedStorage: Hazardous materials subject to special storage rules (¬ß 2 (2) 2nd GFVO) prevent exemption.
reasons.unregulatedHazards: Storing labelled hazardous substances without special rules falls under ¬ß 2 (3) 2nd GFVO, requiring a permit.
reasons.loudMusic: Planned loud music or performances exceed the background music allowance (¬ß 2 (4) 2nd GFVO).
reasons.ippcSeveso: The project is within the IPPC/Seveso scope (¬ß 2 (5) 2nd GFVO) and remains permit-bound.
